data.title: 26. Diocese of Butuan
data.text:
Diocesis Butuanensis

Created: March 20, 1967. Erected: July 10, 1967 Comprises:

the City of Butuan and the Civil Provinces of Agusan del

Norte and Agusan del Sur. Titular: St. Joseph, May 19th.

Bishop

Most Reverend

COSME DAMIAN RACINES ALMEDILLA, DD

Born: September 27, 1959 in Capayas, Trinidad, Bohol. Or -

dained Priest: August 4, 1987 at Santo Niño Parish, Dangcagan, Bukidnon.

Appointed Bishop of Butuan: March 25,2019. Ordained Bishop: June 25, 2019.

Installed as Bishop of Butuan: June 25, 2019.

Mailing Address:

Purok 6, Bishop’s Residence

Ampayon, 8600 Butuan City

P.O. Box 54

Tel.: (085) 342-3749 • Tel./Fax: (085) 816-9251

Mobile: 09177149602

Email: This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.

Website: www.butuandiocese.ph

Fb Page: @butuandioceseph

Past Bishops:

Most Rev. Antonio Javellana Ledesma, SJ, DD

Installed as Apostolic Administrator of Butuan: October 23, 2017

Most Rev. Juan De Dios Mataflorida Pueblos, DD (Deceased)

Installed as Bishop of Butuan: January 17, 1996

Most Rev. Zacharias Cenita Jimenez, DD (Deceased)

Installed Auxillary Bishop of Butuan: June 11, 2003

Most Rev. Carmelo Dominador Flores Morelos, DD, JCD, STL, PHL

Appointed First Bishop of Butuan: April 4, 1967
